column6: Prevention and mitigation of occupational health and safety impacts directly linked by business relationships
column13: The Drones Program is a proactive initiative to assess hazards and enhance safety across various operations. Drones are deployed to gather real-time data and imagery, providing a comprehensive view of work environments and potential hazards.
column14: In FY2023, our drone program inspected plants, structures and rooftops across 14 assets, reducing the risk of personnel having to work at heights. The program also facilitated inspections of more than 20,000 hectares of land, reducing the need for surveyors or other personnel to access remote or hazardous locations.
column20: Drones program, 14 assets, 20,000 hectares of land
